input.sentences: it was a great day to go racing
even the dog was loving this sunny day
each racer pushed themselves harder and harder
it was such a great race that day all enjoyed it
output.sentences: I took part in a bike race.
There were a ton of people racing that day.
There were even some dogs there.
It was a really intense race.
But it was a really good time and so many people were racing and watching.
